content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Caterina., Caterina just said to you: '"Grazie, Marco! That's a relief – everyone's happy now, eh?"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Caterina! Glad to hear it. It's good news all around."
